Actions.Name: CPT Auto-coding - From Diagnosis Name
Actions.Description: Automatically does CPT coding when given the diagnosis name as the input

Actions.Name: CPT Auto-coding - From Discharge Summary Document
Actions.Description: Smartly understand the Diagnosis from a Discharge Summary document without the need to set up any templates beforehand and does CPT auto-coding

Actions.Name: Highlight diagnosis and medical terms - From Discharge Summary Document
Actions.Description: Automatically highlights the diagnosis and other medical terms in a discharge summary document once uploaded

Actions.Name: Highlight disease and medical terms - From Discharge Summary Document
Actions.Description: Automatically highlights the disease and other medical terms in a discharge summary document once uploaded

Actions.Name: ICD10 Auto-coding - From Discharge Summary Document
Actions.Description: Smartly understand the disease from a Discharge Summary document without the need to set up any templates beforehand and does ICD10 auto-coding

Actions.Name: ICD10 Auto-coding - From Disease Name
Actions.Description: Automatically does ICD10 coding when given the disease name as the input
